# addLayoutGuide(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds the specified layout guide to the view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func addLayoutGuide(_ layoutGuide: UILayoutGuide)
```

## Parameters

- **layoutGuide**: The layout guide to be added.

## Discussion

This method adds the specified layout guide to the end of the view’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIView/layoutGuides] array. It also assigns the view to the guide’s [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UILayoutGuide/owningView] property. Each guide can have only one owning view.

After the guide has been added to a view, it can participate in Auto Layout constraints with that view’s hierarchy.

## Working with layout guides

- **layoutGuides**: The array of layout guide objects owned by this view.
- **layoutMarginsGuide**: A layout guide representing the view’s margins.
- **readableContentGuide**: A layout guide representing an area with a readable width within the view.
- **removeLayoutGuide(_:)**: Removes the specified layout guide from the view.
